description:
Wix# is a framework for building a complete MSI or WiX source code by using build script files written with the C# syntax.
The package contains the binaries only.  In order to use this package you need have WiX Toolset installed.
The package is tested against WIX (Windows Installer Xml) version v3.9.1208.0
releaseNotes:
* Implemented support for Fragments.
* Added ToXAttributes extension method for converting AttributesDefinition string into XAttribute array.
* Added e.Session["WIXSHARP_MANAGED_UI"] property, which is set (to the assembly name) for all sessions started via ManagedUI.
* Added WixSharp.SetupArgs.IsManagedUISession member to reflect WIXSHARP_MANAGED_UI property
* Issue #83: No Set_<ActionId> custom action added for Rollback custom actions
* Set_INSTALLDIR_AbsolutePath is rescheduled for beforeAppSearch (related to Issue #85: Absolute path is not reflected in ManagedUI)
title: Wix# (WixSharp) - Binaries
